This game is possably the best game you will ever play. The story is amazing, the gameplay is fun, and the graphics are great. The half-life series is one of the best series there is. 10/10

Likes of HL2: Great game-play, story-line follows through with minimal confusion, challenging fights, vareity of weapons and a decently interactive enviorment. Graphics were nice, though it may not have been top-notch, they were good enough for the game.

Dislikes: One of the enemies shown in the chapter "Our benefactors " you never fight in the game. I found that a little disappointing due to the fact there was most likely a chance somewhere in there to use them.

I recommend this game to anyone who likes weapon variety, challenges, good story-line and gameplay, and overall a very enjoyable game.

Awesome!

Whoa! just Woah! i have been a huge fan of both Half-Life and Half-Life2 and if you can get past the shotty but impressive graphics for its time while playing Half-Life the story line is absolute Genius! and completes the gameplay of Half-Life2 beutifully. I have completed Half-Life2 on the console around 3 or 4 years ago and have just jumped right into the PC gameplay. For a game that around 12 years old the graphics and efficency of Valve's engine is astonoshing and i hope to see Half-Life 3 if the project gets continued and completed to be run on the same Engine Half-Life 2 is! I have been heavily into the gameplay of Half-Life 2 so far and have beaten the game on both easy and medium difficulties and am going for all of the achivements. This game is absolutly astonishing from its graphics to its in game physics i could have possibly imagined a better game. This game is easily the best game of all time. Im sure during its realease period it was ranked #1 world wide. I very much love how it doesnt require Ultra High End PC's altho its still nice to have one ;P I Totally recomend this game! no matter what PC you have it can easily handle this game with astonishing Cinematic Quality and glorious gameplay. This game deserves more than a top rating. I would also strongly suggest getting Half-Life 2: Episode 1, and Half-Life 2: Episode 2. and if your intrested in the true integredy of the Engin that runs the game Half-Life 2: Lost Coast is defanitly a must. Quick "Did you know?" fact. The Lambda is the 11th letter in the greek alphabet used by scientists to represent the Half-Life of a substance. the thought that went into this game <3

 Атмосфера угнетения и общий сеттинг игры тоже радует. Контрасты.

革命性的射击游戏，物理特性和互动性极高，虽然当年一再跳票，不过发布后依然没让玩家们失望
 游戏剧情同样是美国佬典型的个人英雄主义，不过戈登弗里曼这个主角和其他的美国英雄比起来倒也有不少与众不同的地方。
 不过G胖的态度如果再好一点的话就更好了，玩家们对这款游戏如此地热爱，如此地期待，他却一而再再而三地让玩家们失望
总体来说，它配得上神作二字！在04年，拥有这种级别画质和超强互动性和物理特效的游戏已经可以说是顶尖级别了，这都要归功于Valve出色的起源渲染引擎以及Havok物理引擎的强大能力，虽然Valve游戏发布得比较慢，但是Valve的游戏质量到目前为止都不是谁比得上的。
整体感觉：9
画面水平：9
音效表现：7
耐玩性：8
总评：9 神作

Joguei no ano de lançamento e nesta mesma época percebi o quão incrível já era este jogo. Fazendo jus a toda veneração que existe em cima da série HL. Agora, 10 anos depois, em 2014, finalmente investi no tão aclamado Orange Box (Half Life 2, Half Life 2 Episode One, Half Life 2 Epsode Two, Portal e Team Fortress). E que belo investimento! Os gráficos do jogo estão um pouco ultrapassados, mas a física, a diversão, a qualidade... Continuam fazendo dele, um dos melhores jogos que já joguei na vida. Ele não é nem recomendado, ele é Obrigatório. Grande Clássico!!

One of the best FPS thats out there.

This game is better than any other shooter I've ever played, and it was made 10 years ago. A decade has passed and this is still the best.

This isn't nostalgia glasses, either. I wear contacts. And I played this game for the first time last month.

Health-pack-based health instead of regenerative-hide-behind-cover-based health, you can and will carry more than 2 guns at a time, and even though there are probably about 12 to use all at once, you get used to them as you get them, and they're all unique in an immediately recognizable way, so you know which ones are better for certain situations, and which ones are objectively terrible and should be used in case of emergency.

Each area offers something new to enjoy, so the gameplay never offers a sense of monotony. 

Even the graphics are well done enough that you don't notive this game is a decade old. At least, I didn't.

I only have two problems: The abundance of aircrafts you have to destroy with the missile launcher (it's a little much), and the confusion of the story. I feel like the story doesn't make it very clear what's going on, and the game shouldn't make me feel like I'm supposed to know what's happening but don't.

With that said, the game gets a 9.5/10.
